channel.title: [Development] 2D multiplayer game from scratch (Java)
channel.description:
I'm not sure what type of game I'll be making yet but I've made a start so far.
I have plans on making this an online multiplayer game but I've just been developing it as a 2 player game you can play on the same computer with friends.
There have been no external library used nor have I referenced any code from Google (it's pretty basic atm)
[size=10pt][b]Controls[/b][/size] Player 1 uses arrow keys, Player 2 uses W,A,S,D
P = Pause R = Resume (can press P again to resume also). Esc = Opens menu appears (quit game etc etc).
All the images etc., where made in Photoshop. I have an idea to add some music (which are totally made by myself using Fl Studio, uploading a sample soon).
I'm hoping to Apache Mina (personal preference) for the network once I decide that the game design is at an acceptable level.
There is very little game content e.g. walking into house takes you to a new area and you can't clip out anywhere.
Crappy InGame image (the red guy is p1, green p2). [IMG width=500]http://i42.tinypic.com/mjo7cm.png[/img] [b] PLEASE NOTE: THESE IMAGES ARE ONLY USED FOR TESTING, I HAVE MUCH MORE PROFESSIONAL IMAGES THAT I WILL USE.[/b]
Update: Add a basic login screen: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/20zxjll.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/1hdl6w.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/vgml3d.png[/img]
TODO: The basic engine first. Basic game content. Different areas/maps Add music / themes Make more images Add network support Add HP system Add NPC Add combat Add Chat (so you can talk to other people). Add different game revolutions. Better clipping (objects, players) Inventory Items
And more.
The code is hideous and I will not post anything at this current time (not enough to show anyway). House.java is just another frame for when you enter the house (I am planning on changing everything about how the world map's logic will work).
More updates coming soon.

item.title: [Development] 2D multiplayer game from scratch (Java)
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:9, topic:536462”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=655276.msg4389158#msg4389158 date=1386813418]

I like how you have like 8 items listed for content but one that’s engine. Are you planning on making your own engine? If so, just be aware that a game engine will easily trump all content in terms of work load. If you’re not interested in that, then there are plenty of free engines out there to use (Slick2D comes to mind for Java).

You’re always uppity about people using the term ‘engine’.
[/quote]How many pistons does it have?[/quote]Made me lol.

@OP:
Good luck, looking half decent so far. I hope you aren’t making your images too large. It’s one of my peeves when developers make unnecessarily large images for whatever they’re developing.

Read full topic

item.title: [Development] 2D multiplayer game from scratch (Java)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Taharok:

I like how you have like 8 items listed for content but one that’s engine. Are you planning on making your own engine? If so, just be aware that a game engine will easily trump all content in terms of work load. If you’re not interested in that, then there are plenty of free engines out there to use (Slick2D comes to mind for Java).

By engine I mean create something that will process the game and all its events. Yes I will create it all myself. Yeah it’ll be easy lol

I personally would not consider a [size=8pt]while (true)[/size] loop and sleeping it as an engine (unlike some people).

Read full topic

item.title: [Development] 2D multiplayer game from scratch (Java)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Thanks for the comments

Whackatre:

Keep the images this way. It’s much nicer.

Seriously? lol

OT: Working on my music system.
The music system has:
- Multi threaded, each music runs on their own thread (this means, it will not interupt the game and you can play more then one tune at a time)
- Fading; you can fade tracks in and you
- You can select a song that you wish to listen to and play it

Working on amending some things e.g. the last 10 seconds left of the song the track will start to fade out then into the next one.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

I’m not sure what type of game I’ll be making yet but I’ve made a start so far.

I have plans on making this an online multiplayer game but I’ve just been developing it as a 2 player game you can play on the same computer with friends.

There have been no external library used nor have I referenced any code from Google (it’s pretty basic atm)

[size=10pt]Controls[/size]
Player 1 uses arrow keys,
Player 2 uses W,A,S,D

P = Pause
R = Resume (can press P again to resume also).
Esc = Opens menu appears (quit game etc etc).

All the images etc., where made in Photoshop. I have an idea to add some music (which are totally made by myself using Fl Studio, uploading a sample soon).

I’m hoping to Apache Mina (personal preference) for the network once I decide that the game design is at an acceptable level.

There is very little game content e.g. walking into house takes you to a new area and you can’t clip out anywhere.

Crappy InGame image (the red guy is p1, green p2).


PLEASE NOTE: THESE IMAGES ARE ONLY USED FOR TESTING, I HAVE MUCH MORE PROFESSIONAL IMAGES THAT I WILL USE.
